languages.text: "Даже не пытайся вникнуть умом в суть оскверненных Архиврагом машин, если тебе дорога душа! Я сталкивался с механическими творениями еретиков и раньше... по-настоящему постичь их суть значит впустить частицу погибели в свое сердце". {n}Дознаватель молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Но их плоды... как бы ни были отвратны их инструменты, их плоды могут быть полезны".

traits.locale_text: "Даже не пытайся вникнуть умом в суть оскверненных Архиврагом машин, если тебе дорога душа!" {n}Хейнрикс срывается в крик и тут же сокрушенно качает головой.{/n} "Я сталкивался с механическими творениями еретиков и раньше... по настоящему постичь их суть — значит, впустить частицу погибели в свое сердце". {n}Дознаватель молчит несколько секунд, прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Но их плоды... как бы ни были отвратны их инструменты, их плоды могут быть полезны Инквизиции".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."
languages.original_text: "Даже не пытайся вникнуть умом в суть оскверненных Архиврагом машин, если тебе дорога душа! Я сталкивался с механическими творениями еретиков и раньше... по-настоящему постичь их суть значит впустить частицу погибели в свое сердце". {n}Дознаватель молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Но их плоды... как бы ни были отвратны их инструменты, их плоды могут быть полезны".

traits.locale_text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."

I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."

traits.locale_text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这些机器遭到了混沌大敌的腐蚀，不要试图了解它们的本质。至少，如果你还在乎你的灵魂的话，就千万别这么做！我以前见过异端分子造出来的恐怖造物……当你去揣摩它们的本质时，就相当向死亡敞开了心扉。”{n}海因里希沉默片刻。{/n}“但它们结出来的果实……尽管他们的工具可能非常令人憎恶，但结出的果实仍然可能是有用的。”
languages.original_text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."

traits.locale_text: “这些机器遭到了混沌大敌的腐蚀，不要试图了解它们的本质。至少，如果你还在乎你的灵魂的话，就千万别这么做！我以前见过异端分子造出来的恐怖造物……当你去揣摩它们的本质时，就相当向死亡敞开了心扉。”{n}海因里希沉默片刻。{/n}“但它们结出来的果实……尽管他们的工具可能非常令人憎恶，但结出的果实仍然可能是有用的。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No intente descubrir nada sobre la esencia de las máquinas corruptas del Archienemigo. ¡No si valora su alma, al menos! Ya he encontrado antes las abominaciones mecánicas de los herejes... observar su auténtica naturaleza es permitir que una partícula de muerte se introduzca en tu corazón». {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos momentos.{/n} «Pero sus frutos... por horrendos que sean sus instrumentos, sus frutos pueden resultar útiles».
languages.original_text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."

traits.locale_text: «No intente descubrir nada sobre la esencia de las máquinas corruptas del Archienemigo. ¡No si valora su alma, al menos! Ya he encontrado antes las abominaciones mecánicas de los herejes... observar su auténtica naturaleza es permitir que una partícula de muerte se introduzca en tu corazón». {n}Heinrix guarda silencio durante unos momentos.{/n} «Pero sus frutos... por horrendos que sean sus instrumentos, sus frutos pueden resultar útiles».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「渾沌の勢力に腐敗させられた機械の本質を見抜こうとしてはならない！我は以前、異端者たちの忌まわしい機械に遭遇したことがあります…奴らの本質を真に理解することは、陛下の心に死の粒子を入れることにほかならないのです」{n}ハインリックスはしばらくの間沈黙する。{/n}「ですが、奴らが実らせる果実は…どんなに忌まわしい道具であっても、役立つかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の勢力に腐敗させられた機械の本質を見抜こうとしてはならない！我は以前、異端者たちの忌まわしい機械に遭遇したことがあります…奴らの本質を真に理解することは、陛下の心に死の粒子を入れることにほかならないのです」{n}ハインリックスはしばらくの間沈黙する。{/n}「ですが、奴らが実らせる果実は…どんなに忌まわしい道具であっても、役立つかもしれません」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Versucht nicht, irgendeinen Einblick in die Essenz der vom Erzfeind korrumpierten Maschinen zu gewinnen, zumindest nicht, wenn Euch an Eurer Seele liegt! Ich bin den mechanischen Abscheulichkeiten der Ketzer früher schon begegnet ... ihre Natur wirklich zu erfassen, bedeutet, ein Partikel des Todes in Euer Herz zu lassen." {n}Heinrix schweigt kurz.{/n} "Aber ihre Frucht ... so abstoßend ihre Instrumente auch sein mögen, ihre Frucht könnte nützlich sein."
languages.original_text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."

traits.locale_text: "Versucht nicht, irgendeinen Einblick in die Essenz der vom Erzfeind korrumpierten Maschinen zu gewinnen, zumindest nicht, wenn Euch an Eurer Seele liegt! Ich bin den mechanischen Abscheulichkeiten der Ketzer früher schon begegnet ... ihre Natur wirklich zu erfassen, bedeutet, ein Partikel des Todes in Euer Herz zu lassen." {n}Heinrix schweigt kurz.{/n} "Aber ihre Frucht ... so abstoßend ihre Instrumente auch sein mögen, ihre Frucht könnte nützlich sein."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous tenez à votre âme, n'essayez jamais de comprendre l'essence des machines corrompues par le Grand Ennemi ! Ce n'est pas la première fois que je suis confronté aux abominations mécaniques des hérétiques... Chercher à réellement appréhender leur nature revient à laisser une particule de mort entrer dans votre cœur. » {n}Heinrix se tait un instant.{/n} « Les fruits qu'elles portent, cependant... peuvent se révéler utiles, aussi odieuses que soient leurs origines. »
languages.original_text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous tenez à votre âme, n'essayez jamais de comprendre l'essence des machines corrompues par le Grand Ennemi ! Ce n'est pas la première fois que je suis confronté aux abominations mécaniques des hérétiques... Chercher à réellement appréhender leur nature revient à laisser une particule de mort entrer dans votre cœur. » {n}Heinrix se tait un instant.{/n} « Les fruits qu'elles portent, cependant... peuvent se révéler utiles, aussi odieuses que soient leurs origines. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ruhuna biçtiğin en ufak bir paha varsa Şerbaşı'nın yozlaştırdığı makinelerin özünü anlamaya çalışma! Kâfirlerin mekanik yaratıklarıyla daha evvel de karşılaştım... Bunları sahiden anlayabilmek, yüreğine ölümden bir parça koymak demektir." {n}Heinrix, bir müddet sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Lakin muhafaza ettikleri meyve... İşte o meyve, araç gereçlerinin saçtığı tüm bu dehşete karşın kullanışlı olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Do not attempt to gain any insight into the essence of the machines corrupted by the Archenemy, at least, not if you value your soul! I have encountered the heretics' mechanical abominations before... to truly fathom their nature is to allow a particle of death into your heart." {n}Heinrix is silent for a few moments.{/n} "But the fruit they bear... no matter how abhorrent their instruments, the fruit they bear could be useful."

traits.locale_text: “Ruhuna biçtiğin en ufak bir paha varsa Şerbaşı’nın yozlaştırdığı makinelerin özünü anlamaya çalışmayasın! Kâfirlerin mekanik yaratıklarıyla daha evvel de karşılaştım... Bunları sahiden anlayabilmek, yüreğine ölümden bir parça koymak demektir.” {n}Heinrix, bir müddet sessiz kalıyor.{/n} “Lakin muhafaza ettikleri meyve... İşte o meyve, araçlarının saçtığı tüm bu dehşete karşın kullanışlı olabilir.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
